description: The main protagonist with a chronic allergy to cats. Living with his mother and sister who love them does not help at all with his problem. To complicate matters, one day he accidentally destroys the statue of a cat deity, and to compensate for it, he must make use of his newfound ability of communicating with cats to fulfill one hundred requests of help from them, otherwise he will be transformed into one.
name: Kousaka Junpei
